effect.diamond_pearl: Target cannot use its held item for five turns. If the target leaves the field, this effect ends. If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used. If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail. This effect is passed by baton pass.
effect.platinum: Target cannot use its held item for five turns. If the target leaves the field, this effect ends. If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used. If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail. This effect is passed by baton pass.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Target cannot use its held item for five turns. If the target leaves the field, this effect ends. If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used. If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail. This effect is passed by baton pass.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
flavor_text.platinum: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
